title: Value for money
review:
Honor 6x is a decent phone. Both front and rear camera quality is good. Audio quality is average. Though cellular call quality is good. Configuration and performance are up to the mark.

But what if a technically sound phone irritates you whenever you use it?

The phone's internal look and feel is good. What I hate about this phone is its font, font colour, and background.  Imagine a very thin font with light grey colour and a white background. It hurt your eyes easily after using it for a while. No theme can change that irritating font style, colour, and white background. This kills your eyes slowly.
Huawei should think about that. They should allow users to change the font-colour, font-style, font-size and background colour according to their preference.

title: Terrible product
review:
Don't go for this phone, only one and major drawback is you can't connect this phone to your PC/Laptop. So you can't transfer your data from mobile to PC/laptop and vice versa .

Also it's not dual sim, it's optional dual sim, if you insert SD card then it's single sim, if you insert two sim then you can't insert SD card.

Flipkart pl mention the above points in specification, so buyers will think about it before buying this phone.

title: Does the job
review:
Battery backup comparingly  poor after 2 days  hard use. 
Updated to 7.0 after  update camera sucks...   not for.Daily surfers and in low networks area.. It s not suitable..  
I got this for 11700 in big B day...  As per battery consumption phone is not worthy.. 
Fast charging works amazing.. 
So many feature are present in the phone. 
But there will be no battery to use such features at day end..  
So.  This phone only for metro livians and not for students, hard surfers. 
Don't see reviews  in YouTube and don't decide to buy this phone.. 

Everything is fine..  But battery is sucks .. 
And don't update.  Camera will sucks more so i am planing roll back 6.0 

Overall  good phone.  But battery drains fast wen u use ur  phone in low network  area.. 
Not worthy phone.

title: Value-for-money
review:
Hi all, 

I'm writing a review after a week use. I have used samsung, moto, htc before and this is the first time, trying out huweai honor mobiles. First thought to try honor 9i but I haven't seen much difference apart from camera. I have chosen this over others, for camera, better optimization, of course honor build quality and software management.

Now coming to the mobile. I loved the look and design which is similar to its competitor Redmi note 4 but honor is little slim. This is definitely rich to hold, easy to handle but ofcourse slippery which is not a con ;) Display and color reproduction is good compare to other mobiles in this price range.

when it comes to battery, not much impressed and definitely better than its another competitor 'moto g5'. I have used heavily, like high end graphic games, social media , camera shoot continuously and feel like it stays for a half day. But normal use with 4g turn on, it stays for one day. In this point, definitely should add ultra power and power saving mode option which is really awesome, to use your mobile with limited features for long time. No quick charge and takes 2 15 minutes to charge approx.

When it comes to camera, honor gave lot of options to explore compare to other mobiles. Back camera is good. Selfie and bokeh effects are ok. Low light shots are not good. Slow motion video quality sucks.

This mobile running in an android nougat and EMI UI 5.0. ok ok feel. Rarely hangs. And performance is good. Mobile gets heated while playing high end games and charging. Apart from that, it is good unlike where moto and lenovo mobiles heats everytime while surfing.

The main con which would like to mention is less speaker audio quality and missing of IR blaster. Songs over headphone is also average. Call sound quality is also average. That's the only problem which I felt and apart from that , everything is okay and good. Hats off to the flipkart fast delivery. 

PS: always go ahead with 64gb, 4gb ram variant which performs better.

title: Classy product
review: Great product from Huwei, Excellent camera , Though i must say Skund output is not Up To Mark, Jio Works Well as this is Volte handset.. PRODUCT DELIVERY FROM FLIPKART IS GREAT.. I LIKE THE FAST PROCESSING.

title: Moderate
review:
I received Honor 6x with an aftermarket display.  I think Flipkart should look into these matters. The box which I received, has lots of scratches in it, which clearly shows that, the product which i received is a used one. 

But overall the phone is good choice for this budget.

title: Best in the market!
review:
Excellent product!! Got it on the big billion day and product delivered in time by Flipkart!! My review:
1. Excellent build quality 
2. Superb battery (easily lasts 2 working days with normal usage)
3. Superb rear and selfie camera. You won't find this quality at this price!! 
4. Got the Android 7.0 update on the very 1st day.
5. Gorgeous looks!! 
6. Just go for it!!
7. No cons till date....
Thank you Honor and Flipkart!!

title: Fabulous!
review: The main thing to be noticed in this phone is SONY IMX386, it really does a good job. Little disappointed with its front camera. Got it for 11700/- and it is worth for money. Compared it with Redmi note 4 and after so many tests, chosen this beast and it really working nice so far. Best phone in this price range. Go for it without hesitation.
